betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§aBlue Alloy§r is an excellent Cable material for §6HV§r voltage.
Nothing prevents you from using it for §bMV§r voltage too! Beware of not overvolting your machines, though.
Superconductors for both MV and HV are unlocked... much later.

§aElectrotine§r is obtained from the §cNether§r, so don't craft it in the Mixer!

§aElectrotine§r can be separated for §dElectrum§r and §dRedstone§r. If you need 8 whole dusts as input, that's for balance reasons.
